entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
